DOC.brief_summary: We, the investigators at National Taiwan University Hospital, have determined the therapeutic and toxic effects of the traditional herb on the ovariectomized Wistar rat. The final years will determine its effects on the therapy of women who are over 45 years old and postmenopausal with osteoporosis.
DOC.brief_title: Davallia Divaricata BL: The Use of Traditional Chinese Native Medicine for Osteoporosis
DOC.detailed_description: Research of this traditional chinese clinical medicine, Gusuibu, curative effect is planned for three years time. The entire study aims to evaluate the effect of the traditional chinese medicine on postmenopausal osteoporosis as well as the possible side effects on the experimental animal and the human body. All subjects were postmenopausal women with established osteoporosis.
